channel.title: [474] Fallen-Reunion NoLag/Economy/GWD/Skilling/Void/GS/Salve
channel.description:
[center][img]http://fallen-reunion.com/forums/styles/absolution/imageset/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://www.fallen-reunion.com/][b]Website[/b][/url] [url=http://www.fallen-reunion.com/forums][b]Forums[/b][/url] [url=http://www.fallen-reunion.com/donate/donate.html][b]Donate[/b][/url] [url=http://www.fallen-reunion.com/download/FallenReunion%202.0.zip][b]Download Client (2.0)[/b][/url]
[i]Points of interest[/i] [url=http://fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=431][b]Castle Wars Development[/b][/url] | [url=http://fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=44][b]Monthly Competitions[/b][/url] | [url=http://fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewforum.php?f=32][b]Help Desk[/b][/url][/center]
[b]Introduction[/b] Fallen-Reunion is an old school server. It is filled with nostalgia of the 2007 era, constantly improving and expanding, and has a lot of creativity and challenging aspects to explore. We have been in beta for just over a month and are looking to phase out of beta and into the lime light.
The server is ran on a 4GB RAM VPS, with a 100MB/s internet connection.
We pride ourselves on being an honest community. Money spent on the server is shown each month so YOU know where your donations are going. Customers are always number one priority, and any issues are handled with dignity.
We used to be the community of the official CreativeScape by R0cky 0wnz, but unfortunately it closed down. I then took on the community and made my own server, as the community here is such a high spirited, inspirational and talented bunch. Previously called "CreativeScape Reunion", we decided to go under a new name, but with some meaning to our history.
We have a dedicated team of Help Desk Moderators that will answer your question to anything you may have. I know it's daunting when you first join a new server, so you may ask absolutely anything there, and you will be directed ASAP.
If you have any questions or comments, please fire away.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul]459 client 474 cache One of the best combat engines in RSPS Stability (built from Shard, a highly stable source) Highscores Eager PK community/plenty of skilling opportunities, anything to suit your needs Uniqueness (nothing you see here will be copied from a tutorial) Clipped following and NPCs Boxing gloves Caskets (uncommon, dropped universally) Crystal key chest Clothes stall (with over 500 items to steal) Items that actually have usable effects (cooking gauntlets, ice gloves etc.) Our own discontinued items and the usual "rares" market Economy (obtaining items for each skill is worth it and not a dead end job) 200M experience effects (i.e. 200M Slayer opens up a minigame for some new unique items) Laid back yet professional attitude (i.e. we're not kids, you can swear, so long as it's not abusive - there are still rules) Much, much more...[/ul]
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/1.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/2.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/3.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/4.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/5.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/6.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/7.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/290q2a0.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/lef.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/kq.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/chaso.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/tav2.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/tav1.png[/img] [img]http://fallen-reunion.com/forums/download/file.php?id=20[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/11v0dic.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/15i18wn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pX4A8.png[/img]
[i]1,000 Bandos kills[/i] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ilne4y.png[/img]
[img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/slayerportal.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/banshee.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/heal-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/rc.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/seers-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/dog.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/Untitled-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh636/HyperionCRSR/frbubble.png[/img]
[youtube]FkjuiJrbuZM[/youtube]

item.title: [474] Fallen-Reunion NoLag/Economy/GWD/Skilling/Void/GS/Salve
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Wrong section.
Also:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Hyperion himself posted an advertisement thread.

http://www.fallen-reunion.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=258
On this page, it says:

How To Recruit: Use your imagination. So long as it doesn't break any of the rules, you'll be fine. Here's a small list of what you can do: 
Make YouTube videos

Create topics on websites that allow advertising (except for Mopar, Rune-Server and google)
PM your friends who may be interested on other servers or forums you participate in
Link up in your signatures on other forums
PM others in game on other servers (please do not spam or be a nuisance, just ask them politely if they would be interested in an old school server as you are participating in a recruitment drive)


You are also breaking the recruitment drive rule by the server you are even advertising.

/thread

Read full topic

[center]

Website

Points of interest
Castle Wars Development | Monthly Competitions | Help Desk[/center]

Introduction
Fallen-Reunion is an old school server. It is filled with nostalgia of the 2007 era, constantly improving and expanding, and has a lot of creativity and challenging aspects to explore. We have been in beta for just over a month and are looking to phase out of beta and into the lime light.

The server is ran on a 4GB RAM VPS, with a 100MB/s internet connection.

We pride ourselves on being an honest community. Money spent on the server is shown each month so YOU know where your donations are going. Customers are always number one priority, and any issues are handled with dignity.

We used to be the community of the official CreativeScape by R0cky 0wnz, but unfortunately it closed down. I then took on the community and made my own server, as the community here is such a high spirited, inspirational and talented bunch. Previously called “CreativeScape Reunion”, we decided to go under a new name, but with some meaning to our history.

We have a dedicated team of Help Desk Moderators that will answer your question to anything you may have. I know it’s daunting when you first join a new server, so you may ask absolutely anything there, and you will be directed ASAP.

If you have any questions or comments, please fire away.

Features

[ul]459 client
474 cache
One of the best combat engines in RSPS
Stability (built from Shard, a highly stable source)
Highscores
Eager PK community/plenty of skilling opportunities, anything to suit your needs
Uniqueness (nothing you see here will be copied from a tutorial)
Clipped following and NPCs
Boxing gloves
Caskets (uncommon, dropped universally)
Crystal key chest
Clothes stall (with over 500 items to steal)
Items that actually have usable effects (cooking gauntlets, ice gloves etc.)
Our own discontinued items and the usual “rares” market
Economy (obtaining items for each skill is worth it and not a dead end job)
200M experience effects (i.e. 200M Slayer opens up a minigame for some new unique items)
Laid back yet professional attitude (i.e. we’re not kids, you can swear, so long as it’s not abusive - there are still rules)
Much, much more…[/ul]
